programme.title: One Day as a Lion
programme.desc: Jackie Powers will stop at nothing to prevent his son from following him into a life of crime. With his mob employer in pursuit, an encounter at a roadside diner charts a new path. programme.title: A Tiger's Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from the poachers who killed the creature's mother. Together they head for a monastery in Bhutan known as the Tiger's Nest, where Buddhist monks took refuge after the 1950 Chinese invasion of Tibet and protect the big cats. programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy, Romance, Children's, Family ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Shy teenager Ruby Gillman is a kraken who lives on dry land in Oceanside with parents Arthur and Agatha and her younger brother Sam. programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Crime/detective, Family, Sci Fi, Children's ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Turtle brothers Donatello, Leonardo, Michelangelo and Raphael have been raised in the sewers of New York by their mentor Splinter. programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. programme.title: Long Story Short
programme.desc: A man named Teddy wakes up the morning after his wedding to discover that every few minutes he is jumping forward to the next year of his life. programme.title: The Cinema List: Jackie Chan

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Eleanor is a talented but troubled young rookie detective wrestling with the demons of her past, when she is called to the scene of a brutal mass shooting - the work of a new and terrifying murderer. The police and FBI launch a nationwide manhunt, but are thwarted at every turn by the killer's enigmatic, and unprecedented behaviour. Despite her lack of experience, Eleanor is drawn deeper into the case as she, and her newfound mentor, realise that she may be the only person, given her own tortured psyche, who can understand the mind of this singular killer. programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. A random social media post intimates that an old compass, which Ben, John and Martin found as children, could be the missing link to discovering a bust of Marie Antoinette worth an estimated 100million US dollars. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. programme.title: Premier League Years 1995/96
programme.desc: Take a look back at all of the most memorable moments from the 1995-96 Premier League season, with classic music from the time, major news headlines and more.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Newc/Leics '97
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Newcastle United host Leicester City in a seven-goal thriller at St James' Park in the 1996-97 season.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:L'Pool/Man U '94
programme.desc: A chance to relive a Premier League classic. Here, arch rivals Liverpool and Manchester United meet at Anfield back in 1994 in a match that saw one of the Premier League's great comebacks.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Swansea/C Palace '16
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Swansea City take on Crystal Palace at the Liberty Stadium in a high-scoring encounter in the 2016-17 season.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Charlton/WHU '01
programme.desc: Relive one of the Premier League's great games. Here, Charlton Athletic take on West Ham United at The Valley in November 2001 in a pulsating encounter that went down to the wire.

programme.title: Best Premier League Goals 95/96
programme.desc: Sky Sports takes a look at some of the best goals from Premier League seasons in years gone by. Here, enjoy some of the best goals from the 95-96 season.

programme.title: PL 100 Club: Matt Le Tissier
programme.desc: A celebration of some of the finest goalscorers in Premier League history. Here the focus is on Southampton great Matt Le Tissier.

programme.title: PL Legends: Michael Owen
programme.desc: Series profiling some of the greatest players to grace the Barclays Premier League. Here the focus is on former Liverpool and Newcastle United striker Michael Owen.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Man City/Man Utd 2002
programme.desc: Relive one of the Premier League's great games. Here, Manchester City take on Manchester United back in 2002 in the last Manchester derby to be played at Maine Road.

programme.title: PL Greatest : Watford/Fulham 2006
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Watford meet Fulham at Vicarage Road in October 2006 in a remarkable match that had a dramatic late finish.

programme.title: PL Greatest:Liverpool/Chelsea 2001
programme.desc: Relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Liverpool play host to Chelsea at Anfield in the 2000-2001 season, with both sides battling for places in Europe near the season's end.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Wigan/WHU '11
programme.desc: Relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Wigan Athletic meet West Ham United at the DW Stadium in May 2011 in a crucial clash in the battle against relegation.

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: The Premier League leaders Arsenal entertain Gary O'Neil's Wolves in the top flight. Haunted by VAR once more, the visitors slipped to defeat at the Cottage earlier in the week. (02.12).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: In a year that saw Aston Villa win 15 home Premier League games in a row, Unai Emery's side look to cap a scintillating 2023 with victory over strugglers Burnley at Villa Park. (30.12).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Two weeks on from a bad day at Anfield, Aston Villa return to action at home to Crystal Palace in the Premier League. Before the break, Palace beat Wolves 3-2 at Selhurst Park. (16.09).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Five points above the drop zone after victory over West Ham, Forest travel to Villa in the Premier League. The hosts claimed maximum points on the road last weekend at Fulham. (24.02).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Off the mark with a draw at home to Wolves, Luton visit an invigorated Everton. Dominic Calvert-Lewin netted the winner last week in a worthy win at the Gtech for the Toffees. (30.09).

programme.title: PL: 2023/24 Highlights
programme.desc: Mikel Arteta's Arsenal travel to Bournemouth in the Premier League. The Gunners come from a thrilling derby day draw with Tottenham, while the Cherries fell at the Amex previously. (30.09).

programme.title: Premier League Years 1996/97

programme.title: CL: United v Barcelona 07/08
programme.desc: United Archives 29/4/08. Sir Alex Ferguson's men progress to the final in Moscow thanks to a wonder strike from the majestic Paul Scholes.

programme.title: UCL: United v Dynamo Kiev 07/08
programme.desc: United Archives 7/11/07. United hit four goals for the 3rd successive home game, hammering Ukrainian champions Dynamo Kiev in the process.

programme.title: PL: United v Portsmouth 07/08
programme.desc: United Archives 30/1/08. Cristiano Ronaldo scored arguably his greatest goal in a United shirt, as that unforgettable free kick helped the Reds claim a vital three points.

programme.title: PL: United v Liverpool 07/08
programme.desc: United Archives 23/3/08. Sir Alex's side could complete a league double over Liverpool and take a huge stride towards retaining their PL title when Rafa Benitez brought his side to Old Trafford.

programme.desc: Highlights of the Reds' pre-season friendly against Rangers.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 07/08

programme.desc: The NFC West-leading San Francisco 49ers host the Tampa Bay Buccaneers in week 11 of the season. The Niners snapped a three-game skid in their dominant week 10 win over the Jaguars. (19.11).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The Green Bay Packers go to the Minnesota Vikings during week 17 of the NFL. The Packers kept themselves in the NFC playoff hunt with a Christmas Eve win over the Panthers. (31.12).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Inoue v Nery
programme.desc: The undisputed world super-bantamweight title is on the line in Tokyo, as the formidable Japanese star Naoya Inoue defends his crown against Mexico's Luis Nery. (06.05).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Lopez v Claggett
programme.desc: Teofimo Lopez takes centre stage in Miami, defending his WBO super-lightweight title against Canadian contender Steve Claggett, who is on a nine fight winning streak. (30.06).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The Minnesota Vikings host the Chicago Bears in week 12 of the 2023 NFL. The Vikings enter this one having seen their five-game winning streak come to an end on the road at Denver. (27.11).

programme.title: Fight Night:Billam-Smith/Riakporhe
programme.desc: At Selhurst Park, an all-British showdown unfolds as Chris Billam-Smith looks to avenge his only loss while defending the WBO cruiserweight world title against Richard Riakporhe. (15.06).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The Miami Dolphins host the Tennessee Titans in the NFL. (11.12).

programme.title: Fight Night: Jonas v Mayer
programme.desc: Putting her IBF world welterweight championship on the line, Natasha Jonas steps inside the ring with former unified world champion Mikaela Mayer at the M&S Bank Arena in Liverpool. (20.01).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: A match-up during week 17 of the NFL season, as a 8-7 Cincinnati Bengals side scrambling to make the playoffs face the Kansas City Chiefs. Patrick Mahomes' Chiefs lost last week. (31.12).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The Carolina Panthers host the New Orleans Saints at the Bank of America Stadium in week two of the NFL. Derek Carr impressed on his Saints debut as they beat the Titans previously. (18.09).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Lopez v Claggett
programme.desc: Teofimo Lopez takes centre stage in Miami, defending his WBO super-lightweight title against Canadian contender Steve Claggett, who is on a nine fight winning streak. (30.06).

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Muratalla v Farmer
programme.desc: Undefeated contender Raymond Muratalla meets a former world champion, Tevin Farmer, as the pair face off across 10 rounds of lightweight boxing in Las Vegas. (14.07).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The Pittsburgh Steelers host the Cleveland Browns at Acrisure Stadium in week two of the 2023 NFL season. Cleveland opened the season with a 24-3 victory over the Bengals. (18.09).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: Needing a win to make the playoffs, the Green Bay Packers are faced with an eliminated divisional rival, the Chicago Bears, at home during the final week of the NFL regular season. (06.01).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Nakatani v Astrolabio
programme.desc: In Tokyo, Japan, undefeated three-division world champion Junto Nakatani puts the WBC bantamweight title on the line against Vincent Astrolabio of the Philippines. (20.07).

programme.title: Fight Night I: Navarrete/Berinchyk
programme.desc: San Diego sees the crowning of a new WBO lightweight champion, as Emanuel Navarrete and Denys Berinchyk go one on one for the vacant title. (19.05).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Inoue v Nery
programme.desc: The undisputed world super-bantamweight title is on the line in Tokyo, as the formidable Japanese star Naoya Inoue defends his crown against Mexico's Luis Nery. (06.05).

programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: In an NFC divisional round matchup, the Detroit Lions host the Tampa Bay Buccaneers. The last time the Lions won multiple playoff games dates back to their 1957 championship run. (21.01).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: Los Angeles Chargers meet an AFC North-leading Baltimore Ravens during week 12. Baltimore secured victory in a big divisional match-up previously, dispatching the Bengals 34-20. (26.11).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The Dallas Cowboys meet the Philadelphia Eagles during week 14 of the 2023 NFL season. Previously, the Cowboys defeated the Seattle Seahawks to extend their winning run to four. (10.12).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: Josh Allen and Buffalo challenge Super Bowl champions Kansas City in the NFL. Kansas still lead the AFC West, but fell behind three others for the top seed in defeat to the Packers. (10.12).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: Needing a win to make the playoffs, the Green Bay Packers are faced with an eliminated divisional rival, the Chicago Bears, at home during the final week of the NFL regular season. (06.01).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: A trip to the postseason is on the line for Buffalo as they travel to Miami to face the Dolphins in the final regular season game. The Bills also have a chance to win the AFC East. (07.01).

programme.title: Live: Good Morning Football
programme.desc: Get up-to-the-minute breaking NFL news, headline-making interviews and local NFL stories.

programme.title: Fight Night Int:Muratalla v Farmer
programme.desc: Undefeated contender Raymond Muratalla meets a former world champion, Tevin Farmer, as the pair face off across 10 rounds of lightweight boxing in Las Vegas. (14.07).

programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Week 16 of the NFL season continues as the Denver Broncos host the New England Patriots. Denver's playoff hopes took a hit last week after falling to the NFC North-leading Lions. (24.12).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: With a playoff berth secured, the Dallas Cowboys go to an AFC East-leading Miami Dolphins in the NFL. Mike McDaniel's Miami returned to form by blowing out the Jets 30-0 last week. (24.12).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Nakatani v Astrolabio
programme.desc: In Tokyo, Japan, undefeated three-division world champion Junto Nakatani puts the WBC bantamweight title on the line against Vincent Astrolabio of the Philippines. (20.07).

programme.title: Fight Night I: Navarrete/Berinchyk
programme.desc: San Diego sees the crowning of a new WBO lightweight champion, as Emanuel Navarrete and Denys Berinchyk go one on one for the vacant title. (19.05).

programme.title: Best of NFL (1hr)
programme.desc: The Las Vegas Raiders host the New York Jets in week 10 of the season. After firing their coach and GM, Antonio Pierce took interim charge to lead the Raiders to week nine victory. (12.11).

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Lopez v Claggett
programme.desc: Teofimo Lopez takes centre stage in Miami, defending his WBO super-lightweight title against Canadian contender Steve Claggett, who is on a nine fight winning streak. (30.06).

programme.title: Best Of NFL 23/24
programme.desc: Week 15 of the NFL season continues as the Buffalo Bills host a Dallas Cowboys side enjoying a run of five straight wins, including a win over their NFC East rivals Philadelphia. (17.12).
